mapper.select: select id, movie_id, movie_name, director, star, type, country_language, viewing_state, release_time, plot, update_time, is_recommend, img, classify, source_name, source_url, create_time, local_img, label, original_href, description, target_href, use_status, score, category, ranks, user_id, douban_url from movie_network where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into movie_network(movie_id, movie_name, director, star, type, country_language, viewing_state, release_time, plot, update_time, is_recommend, img, classify, source_name, source_url, create_time, local_img, label, original_href, description, target_href, use_status, score, category, ranks, user_id, douban_url) values (#{movieId}, #{movieName}, #{director}, #{star}, #{type}, #{countryLanguage}, #{viewingState}, #{releaseTime}, #{plot}, #{updateTime}, #{isRecommend}, #{img}, #{classify}, #{sourceName}, #{sourceUrl}, #{createTime}, #{localImg}, #{label}, #{originalHref}, #{description}, #{targetHref}, #{useStatus}, #{score}, #{category}, #{ranks}, #{userId}, #{doubanUrl})

on duplicate key update movie_id = values(movie_id), movie_name = values(movie_name), director = values(director), star = values(star), type = values(type), country_language = values(country_language), viewing_state = values(viewing_state), release_time = values(release_time), plot = values(plot), update_time = values(update_time), is_recommend = values(is_recommend), img = values(img), classify = values(classify), source_name = values(source_name), source_url = values(source_url), create_time = values(create_time), local_img = values(local_img), label = values(label), original_href = values(original_href), description = values(description), target_href = values(target_href), use_status = values(use_status), score = values(score), category = values(category), ranks = values(ranks), user_id = values(user_id), douban_url = values(douban_url)

movie_id = #{movieId},
movie_name = #{movieName},

img = #{img},

source_url = #{sourceUrl},

local_img = #{localImg},
label = #{label},

target_href = #{targetHref},
use_status = #{useStatus},
score = #{score},

ranks = #{ranks},

where id = #{id}
